title: 第 10 集 花园种菜！ | Gardening!

data.en: Gardening!

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治在猪爷爷和猪奶奶家里玩。
data.en: Peppa and George are playing at Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house.
Grandpa! Catch!
Catch!
What's this?
A dinosaur!
Grandpa, what are you doing?
I'm planting these seeds.
Seeds? What do seeds do?
Seeds grow into plants.

data.zh: 我先挖个小坑然后把种子放进去。
data.en: I just make a little hole and put the seed in.
Then I cover it with earth and water it.

data.zh: 我花园里所有东西都是从这样小的种子长成的。
data.en: Everything in my garden grows from tiny seeds like these.

data.zh: 连那个大苹果树也是吗？
data.en: Even the big apple tree?
Oh! Yes!

data.zh: 这小小的种子会长成一棵小苹果树，就像这棵。
data.en: This tiny seed will grow into a little apple tree, like this.

data.zh: 然后这些小苹果树会长成像这样大的苹果树。
data.en: And that little apple tree will grow into a big apple tree like this.

data.zh: 而且这苹果里还有很多这样的种子。
data.en: And inside this apple are more seeds.

data.zh: 可以长出更多的苹果树！
data.en: To make more apple trees!
Exactly!

data.zh: 爷爷！爷爷！我想种一粒种子！
data.en: Grandpa! Grandpa! I want to plant a seed!

data.zh: 你想不想种粒草莓种子？
data.en: Would you like to plant a strawberry seed?
Yes, please!

data.zh: 这个种子会长成一棵可爱的草莓。
data.en: This seed will grow into a lovely strawberry plant.
First, make a little hole.

data.zh: 然后我把种子放在里面再埋上土。
data.en: Then I put the seed in and cover it with earth.
Shall I water it for you?

data.zh: 不要！不要！我想自己来浇水。
data.en: No! No! I want to water it.

data.zh: 好的！现在我们来等它长大。
data.en: Good! Now we wait for it to grow.

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治等着种子发芽。
data.en: Peppa and George are waiting for the seed to grow.
It's not doing anything!
You will have to be patient, Peppa.

data.zh: 它需要很长的时间才能发芽。
data.en: It will take a long time to grow.

data.zh: 佩奇！乔治！是时候回家了。
data.en: Peppa! George! It's time to go home.

data.zh: 但是我在等着我的草莓发芽！
data.en: But we're waiting for my strawberry plant to grow!

data.zh: 我还等着草莓来泡茶呢。
data.en: I wanted strawberries for teas.
Don't worry, Peppa.
Next time you come,

data.zh: 这些种子就会长成草莓苗。
data.en: the seed will have grown into a plant.
And we will have strawberries!
Yes.
Come on, Peppa.

data.zh: 再见，爷爷。 再见，草莓。
data.en: Bye bye, Grandpa. Bye bye, strawberry.

data.zh: 猪爷爷照看着佩奇的草莓苗。
data.en: Grandpa Pig looks after Peppa's strawberry plant.

data.zh: 过了几天，猪爷爷发现一棵小幼苗长出来了。
data.en: After many days, Grandpa Pig finds a tiny plant growing.

data.zh: 日复一日，草莓苗越长越大。
data.en: Day by day, the plant grows bigger and bigger.

data.zh: 然后有一天，猪爷爷发现了一些特别的东西。
data.en: Then one day, Grandpa Pig finds something very special.
Strawberries!
Grandpa! We're back!
Peppa and George have come to play again.

data.zh: 爷爷！爷爷！我的草莓苗长大了吗？
data.en: Grandpa! Grandpa! Did my plant grow?
Yes! Look!
Strawberries!
Thank you, Grandpa!

data.zh: 爷爷，我们能不能种点别的呢？
data.en: Grandpa, can we plant something else?

data.zh: 可以！现在，轮到乔治选了。
data.en: Yes! Now, it's George's turn to choose.
Yes! You choose, George.
Choose... a carrot!

data.zh: 爷爷，我想乔治想种胡萝卜。
data.en: Grandpa, I think George wants to grow a carrot.
George, would you like to grow a carrot?
No!
What would you like to grow?

data.zh: 乔治想到他想种的东西了。
data.en: George has thought of something he wants to grow.
George wants to grow a dinosaur tree!
Silly George!

data.zh: 恐龙是不会长成恐龙树的。
data.en: Dinosaurs don't grow on trees.
